wikipedia_page.main: George Henry Sharp (born 20 July 1935) is an English former amateur footballer who played as an outside left in the Football League for Darlington and Oldham Athletic. He stood in for Tommy Moran in three Fourth Division matches early in Darlington's 1957–58 season; his debut, on 31 August 1957, was in a 5–0 defeat away to Scunthorpe United. He moved on to Oldham later that season, and appeared once in the League.He was born in Bedlington, Northumberland.

response: George Sharpe or Sharp may refer to:
*George Sharp, illustrator of e.g., of James Clavell's children' book Thrump-O-Moto (1986)
